alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:44PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Weber...southeastern Box Elder and northwestern Davis Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 443 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hooper, or 9 miles west of Hill Air Force Base, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Roy, Clearfield, Syracuse, Clinton, Hooper, Marriott-Slaterville, Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, West Haven, West Point, Pleasant View, Farr West, Plain City, Sunset, West Warren, Warren, West Weber, Slaterville and Antelope Island State Park. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 346 and 350. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front
